project.name: SEO Research MCP Server
project.description: Multi-source SEO research MCP server that aggregates keyword research, backlink analysis, and SERP data from DataForSEO, Crawl4AI, Brave Search, Perplexity, Tavily, and SerpAPI for AI agents
project.author: Neo-MCP Team

tasks.title: Project Setup and MCP Server Foundation
tasks.description: Set up the basic MCP server infrastructure with TypeScript, proper project structure, and core dependencies
tasks.details: Initialize TypeScript MCP server project with proper folder structure, install MCP SDK, set up build system, configure linting and testing frameworks. Create basic server entry point and configuration management.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify server starts correctly, MCP protocol compliance, and basic configuration loading

tasks.title: Environment Configuration and API Key Management
tasks.description: Implement secure configuration management for all API keys and service endpoints
tasks.details: Create configuration system for DataForSEO, Brave, Perplexity, Tavily, SerpAPI, and OpenAI API keys. Implement environment variable validation, secure storage, and configuration validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test configuration loading, validation, and error handling for missing or invalid API keys

tasks.title: DataForSEO API Integration
tasks.description: Implement DataForSEO API client for keyword research, SERP data, and backlink analysis
tasks.details: Create DataForSEO API client with support for Keywords Data API, SERP API, and Backlinks API. Implement proper error handling, rate limiting, and response parsing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API connectivity, data retrieval, error handling, and rate limiting compliance

tasks.title: Keyword Research MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement keyword_research MCP tool for multi-source keyword discovery and metrics
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that accepts keywords/domains and returns comprehensive keyword data including search volume, CPC, competition, and trends from DataForSEO and other sources.
tasks.testStrategy: Test tool with various keyword inputs, validate response format, and verify data accuracy

tasks.title: Backlink Analysis MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement backlink_analysis MCP tool for domain and URL backlink profile analysis
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that analyzes backlink profiles for domains/URLs, including referring domains, anchor text analysis, link types, and authority metrics using DataForSEO Backlinks API.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various domains/URLs, validate backlink data accuracy, and verify response formatting

tasks.title: Brave Search API Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Brave Search API for web search, news, and content discovery
tasks.details: Implement Brave Search API client with support for web search, news search, image search, and local search capabilities. Include proper error handling and response parsing.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality across different content types and validate response quality

tasks.title: Perplexity and Tavily API Integration
tasks.description: Integrate Perplexity and Tavily APIs for real-time web search and content extraction
tasks.details: Implement API clients for Perplexity (web search with recency filters) and Tavily (real-time web search and domain-specific search). Include proper authentication and error handling.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search capabilities, recency filtering, and content extraction accuracy

tasks.title: SerpAPI Integration
tasks.description: Integrate SerpAPI for Google/Bing/Yahoo search data extraction
tasks.details: Implement SerpAPI client with support for Google, Bing, Yahoo, News, Scholar, Trends, Finance, Maps, Images, and YouTube search data extraction.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search data extraction across different engines and validate data completeness

tasks.title: Content Extraction MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement content_extraction MCP tool for scraping and extracting content from URLs
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that can scrape and extract content from arbitrary URLs using Crawl4AI integration and Tavily's extraction capabilities. Support both LLM-based and selector-based extraction.
tasks.testStrategy: Test content extraction from various website types and validate extraction quality

tasks.title: SERP Analysis MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement serp_analysis MCP tool for SERP snapshot and ranking analysis
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that provides SERP snapshots for keywords, analyzes ranking positions, identifies featured snippets, and tracks SERP features using DataForSEO and SerpAPI.
tasks.testStrategy: Test SERP analysis accuracy, ranking position detection, and feature identification

tasks.title: Competitor Analysis MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement competitor_analysis MCP tool to identify and analyze competitors
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that identifies top competitors for keywords/domains, analyzes their SEO strategies, backlink profiles, and ranking positions across multiple data sources.
tasks.testStrategy: Test competitor identification accuracy and analysis completeness

tasks.title: Caching and Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Implement intelligent caching system to minimize API costs and improve performance
tasks.details: Implement Redis-based caching system with intelligent cache invalidation, TTL management, and cost optimization strategies. Include cache warming and performance monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test cache hit rates, performance improvements, and cost reduction metrics

tasks.title: Long-tail Keyword Generator MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement long_tail_generator MCP tool for generating targeted long-tail keywords
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that generates high-potential long-tail keywords for specific domains using multiple data sources and LLM processing. Include semantic analysis and search intent alignment.
tasks.testStrategy: Test keyword generation quality, relevance, and search potential accuracy

tasks.title: Keyword Clustering MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement keyword_clustering MCP tool for semantic grouping of keywords
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that performs semantic clustering of keywords using LLM processing and RAG capabilities. Group related keywords by intent, topic, and search behavior.
tasks.testStrategy: Test clustering accuracy, semantic relevance, and group coherence

tasks.title: Trend Analysis MCP Tool
tasks.description: Implement trend_analysis MCP tool for market trends and historical data analysis
tasks.details: Create MCP tool that analyzes market trends, historical keyword performance, and emerging opportunities using data from multiple sources including Google Trends integration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test trend detection accuracy, historical data analysis, and opportunity identification

tasks.title: Error Handling and Monitoring
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling, logging, and monitoring system
tasks.details: Create robust error handling for all API integrations, implement structured logging, monitoring dashboards, and alerting for system health and API quota management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test error scenarios, logging accuracy, and monitoring alert functionality

tasks.title: Rate Limiting and Quota Management
tasks.description: Implement rate limiting and API quota management across all integrated services
tasks.details: Implement intelligent rate limiting, quota tracking, and cost management across DataForSEO, Brave, Perplexity, Tavily, and SerpAPI to prevent overages and optimize usage.
tasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting effectiveness, quota tracking accuracy, and cost optimization

tasks.title: Docker Containerization and Deployment
tasks.description: Create Docker containers and deployment configuration for production readiness
tasks.details: Create Dockerfile, docker-compose configuration, and deployment scripts. Include health checks, environment configuration, and integration with existing Neo-MCP infrastructure.
tasks.testStrategy: Test containerized deployment, health checks, and integration with Neo-MCP ecosystem

tasks.title: Integration Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing of all MCP tools and API integrations
tasks.details: Create comprehensive test suite covering all MCP tools, API integrations, error scenarios, and end-to-end workflows. Include performance testing and load testing.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute full test suite, validate all functionality, and ensure production readiness

tasks.title: Documentation and Integration Guide
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation and integration guides for the SEO Research MCP Server
tasks.details: Create API documentation, integration guides, configuration examples, and usage tutorials. Include examples for common SEO research workflows and AI agent integration patterns.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate documentation accuracy and completeness through user testing
